title: I cannot find all the local music files when using the built-in music player
answer: The built-in music player supports the following audio files by default: *.mp3, *.wav, *.ogg, *.mid and *.amr. Other audio file formats such as *.awb, *.aac, *.flac and *.mkv are only supported on some phone models. This is determined by the phone's hardware chip platform. If the phone doesn't support the file format, local music files in this format will not be found by the built-in music player.
keywords: preloaded, player, music, scan, local, files
